Sentencas: The effect of temperature and complex dopant composition on oxygen ion conductivity in solid oxide electrolyte fuel cells was investigated by atomistic molecular dynamics simulation.
Titulo: Nd2-xGdxZr2O7 electrolytes: Thermal expansion and effect of temperature and dopant concentration on ionic conductivity of oxygen

Sentencas: A new electrolyte (Nd2-xGdxZr2O7) was selected to study oxygen ion conductivity using three Gd compositions (x = 0.8, 1.0, and 1.2) in a wide range of temperature (T = 1273 K-1873 K).
Titulo: Nd2-xGdxZr2O7 electrolytes: Thermal expansion and effect of temperature and dopant concentration on ionic conductivity of oxygen

Sentencas: MSD results of cations showed these groups of electrolyte are stable at high operating temperature.
Titulo: Nd2-xGdxZr2O7 electrolytes: Thermal expansion and effect of temperature and dopant concentration on ionic conductivity of oxygen

Sentencas: The first composition (x = 0.8) had the highest ionic conductivity that was in good agreement with the experimental data.
Titulo: Nd2-xGdxZr2O7 electrolytes: Thermal expansion and effect of temperature and dopant concentration on ionic conductivity of oxygen

Sentencas: A simple effective model that works with configuration energy of the oxygen crossing plate was applied to explain the observed conductivity trend.
Titulo: Nd2-xGdxZr2O7 electrolytes: Thermal expansion and effect of temperature and dopant concentration on ionic conductivity of oxygen

Sentencas: The model illustrated the point as well.
Titulo: Nd2-xGdxZr2O7 electrolytes: Thermal expansion and effect of temperature and dopant concentration on ionic conductivity of oxygen

Sentencas: Increasing Gd concentration decreases existence probability of easy crossing plate.
Titulo: Nd2-xGdxZr2O7 electrolytes: Thermal expansion and effect of temperature and dopant concentration on ionic conductivity of oxygen

Sentencas: Radial distribution function analysis also confirmed results.
Titulo: Nd2-xGdxZr2O7 electrolytes: Thermal expansion and effect of temperature and dopant concentration on ionic conductivity of oxygen

Sentencas: Thermal expansion of the electrolyte has a major effect on the selecting of the electrolyte materials; thus, this important factor was also studied.
Titulo: Nd2-xGdxZr2O7 electrolytes: Thermal expansion and effect of temperature and dopant concentration on ionic conductivity of oxygen

Sentencas: Results showed the first composition had the greatest thermal expansion.
Titulo: Nd2-xGdxZr2O7 electrolytes: Thermal expansion and effect of temperature and dopant concentration on ionic conductivity of oxygen
